item.title: Mission 3
item.description: This is the current rank in the Repertoire classification contest, see what your rank is ;) {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"R":[4,2,3,1,6,5],"delta":[3,0,0,-3,1,-1],"Group Name":["APC","Antigen","Peptide","ImmuneAI","WillSmith","ChrisRock"],"Members":["X,Y,Z","A,A,A","P",null,"Will, Smith",null],"F1 score":[0.8,0.828,0.801,0.844,0.557,0.786]},"columns":[{"accessor":"R","name":"R","type":"numeric","minWidth":30,"align":"center","headerStyle":{"background":"#f7f7f8"}},{"accessor":"delta","name":"Δ","type":"numeric","minWidth":70,"align":"center","headerStyle":{"background":"#f7f7f8"},"cell":["↓ -3","↑ 0","↑ 0","↑ 3","↓ -1","↑ 1"]},{"accessor":"Group Name","name":"Group Name","type":"character","minWidth":70,"align":"center","headerStyle":{"background":"#f7f7f8"}},{"accessor":"Members","name":"Members","type":"character","minWidth":70,"align":"center","headerStyle":{"background":"#f7f7f8"}},{"accessor":"F1 score","name":"F1 score","type":"numeric","minWidth":70,"align":"center","headerStyle":{"background":"#f7f7f8"}}],"resizable":true,"searchable":true,"defaultSorted":[{"id":"R","desc":false}],"defaultPageSize":10,"paginationType":"numbers","showPageInfo":true,"minRows":1,"highlight":true,"nowrap":true,"language":{"searchPlaceholder":"Search...","noData":"No entries found"},"dataKey":"16089ed8b17edc62d5186d7a968f721a","key":"16089ed8b17edc62d5186d7a968f721a"},"children":[]},"class":"reactR_markup"},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
